TestGroupDocumentation.Title: totalDigits1 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a totalDigits-1.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a byte restricted SimpleType with totalDigits value 1.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML byte totalDigits-1.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls totalDigits-1-1.xml document which specifies valid value 2 for the byte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-byte-totalDigits-1 element, sets the values: -9, 0, 9 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML byte totalDigits-1.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls totalDigits-1-1.xml document which specifies valid value 2 for the byte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-byte-totalDigits-1 element, sets the values: -128, -10, 10, 127 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML byte totalDigits-1.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of byte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-byte-totalDigits-1 type, sets the values: -9, 0, 9 and expects the validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML byte totalDigits-1.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of byte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-byte-totalDigits-1 type, sets the values: -128, -10, 10, 127 and expects validation to fail.
